verses.name: Joshua 1:15
verses.text: Until the Lord have given your brethren rest, as he hath given you, and they also have possessed the land which the Lord your God giveth them: then ye shall return unto the land of your possession, and enjoy it, which Moses the Lord’s servant gave you on this side Jordan toward the sunrising.

verses.name: Joshua 1:16
verses.text: And they answered Joshua, saying, All that thou commandest us we will do, and whithersoever thou sendest us, we will go.
